text: evan nerana valiyil celkirano avan tan nanmaikkakave nerana valiyil celkiran. Evan tavarana valiyil celkirano avan (tavarana valiyil cenru) tanakke tinkilaittuk kolkiran. Oruvanutaiya pavaccumaiyai marroruvan cumakka mattan. (Namatu) tutar oruvarai anuppata varai nam (evaraiyum) vetanai ceyvatillai
